item.title: CVE-2024-4077|2024-04-25T09:15:22.154Z -- AndonDesign -- UDesign
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in AndonDesign UDesign allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects UDesign: from n/a through 4.7.3.
